alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:28AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles south of Buyck, to near Tower, to near Mountain Iron, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tower around 335 AM CDT. Biwabik around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Aurora, Robinson, Embarrass, Burntside Lake, Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness Near Trout Lake, Ely, Hoyt Lakes and White Iron Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North St. Louis
